com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class SCMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.SCMLReader

  • public class SCMLReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses a SCML file and creates a Data instance. If you want to keep track of what is going on during the build process of the objects parsed from the SCML file, you could extend this class and override the load*() methods for pre or post processing. This could be e.g. useful for a loading screen which responds to the current building or parsing state.
